#summary Description of Collector module.
#labels Phase-Requirements,Phase-Design

= Collector =

Metrics data acquisition, Extraction and Transformation


Parts:
  * Agent (Monitoring API)
    * Plug-ins for: SMTP, JMX, Web client-side monitoring, DB selects, ...
  * Collector core (collecting metrics before sending) - sending data every 60sec (conf) or every 64kB (conf)
  * Sender (sending data by asynchronous messaging, Active MQ)
